events.title: Breaking Sound November 6 at The Peppermint Club
events.location: Los Angeles, California, United States Of America
events.description: Ages 21+ Welcome w/ Valid ID Doors: 7PM GET TO KNOW THE ARTISTS: With SAUNDIA combining elements of pop, r&b, and world music with soulful and sensual vocals, and APOLLONIA destined to become the next biggest popstar in the world - this is a lineup surely not to be missed
